meanings.definition: (adjective) most attractive or appealing in a strong, masculine way
meanings.sent1: He is the hunkiest guy in the room.
meanings.sent2: The actor was voted the hunkiest man of the year.
meanings.sent3: The hunkiest firefighter saved the kitten from the tree.
meanings.sent4: His muscles were the hunkiest sight on the beach.
meanings.sent5: The hunkiest cowboy rode into town on his horse.

meanings.definition: (adverb) in a manner that is most attractive or appealing in a strong, masculine way
meanings.sent1: He dressed hunkiest for the party.
meanings.sent2: The model walked hunkiest down the runway.
meanings.sent3: The superhero fought hunkiest against the villain.
meanings.sent4: She sang hunkiest during the concert.
meanings.sent5: The athlete ran hunkiest in the race.
